description: Step right up to a high noon showdown of 3D Carnival Games® action in the Wild West! With 25 games and attractions like Outlaw Wrangler, Git the Gold and Nugget Falls, find out if you're the fastest Quick Draw in town with motion-compatible controls! Use StreetPass™ to access Bonus Slots, gussy up characters in western wearables and win jump-off-the-screen 3D prizes!
name:
Carnival Games®
Wild West 3D
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
